DOC.brief_summary: Primary insomnia patient sleep Quetiapine well without Quetiapine
DOC.brief_title: Quetiapine Primary Insomnia Patients : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Primary insomnia diagnose accord DSM-IV-TR 2 . After consent , case divide ( double blind randomization ) two arm 2.1 sleep hygiene placebo group 2.2 sleep hygiene Quetiapine group 3. outcome measurement : sleep diary , sleep satisfaction visual analog scale sleep satisfaction likert scale 4. statistical method : dependent T test
DOC.criteria: Primary insomnia Patients DSMIVTR criterion case enrol : age 1865 educate Currently receive Quetiapine hypnotic drug Liver disease Patients heart Dz , Hypertension , thyroid disease History epilepsy febrile convulsion pregnant cognitive impairment History Orthostatic Hypotension Patient Psychiatric condition Drug dependence
